attributes.additional_details: i want to know how tesco get away with putting the prices up on products by a whopping 11% and think they're giving us a fair deal by doing the whole 'price drop' thing. its all a con. if you look at the small print on the shelf label, they change the original price to make it look like you're getting a good deal. i want to sue tesco for false information and conning the public.
